title: Bring back ranked twisted treeline more often.
body:
I've fell in love with this map and am pretty sad to see the ranked scene of it up only once a week, could we get it more often on oce? like weekdays twisted treeline weekends other game modes like 6v6, one for all etc.

Really want to play alot of it to get a good rating with it.

(also the placements are kind of dodgey on oce you got diamond 5's getting bronze 2 from going 8/2 and silver 3's getting plat 1)

replies.body:
I'd like to see it more often, I finally managed to play some tonight after wanting to do so for weeks.

(couldn't last week thanks to being unconscious with blood pissing out my nose, thanks hot weather)

But unless if the server pop can handle it we wont see it more often.
The matches I had tonight were quite decent for the most part, unfortunately the two I lost were lost from the lobby thanks to trolls/morons.

>(couldn't last week thanks to being unconscious with blood pissing out my nose, thanks hot weather)

I hate to pry, but how does the hot weather cause blood to be pissing out of your nose (and i'm not trolling i'm just genuinely curious.)
Happens to me also. Having blood on the thinner side helps i.e. a bleeder.
Ah not a clue, just get nose bleeds occasionally in hot dry weather.

But you're so amazing at the map that no one has enough courage to face you on the weekend, in your prime. Rito can't get the numbers.

Just the curse of the brilliant I'm afraid.
